actions.name: Greyfur's Staff
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) bludgeoning damage plus 5 (2d4) force damage.

actions.name: Arcane Bolt
actions.desc: Ranged Spell Attack: +5 to hit, range 60 ft., one target. Hit: 10 (2d6 + 3) force damage.

actions.name: Spellcasting
actions.desc:
The greyfur casts one of the following spells, requiring no material components and using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 13):
At will: light, mage hand, prestidigitation
3/day each: color spray, sleep

special_abilities.name: Glide
special_abilities.desc: The lemurfolk has membranes between its fore and hind limbs that expand when falling to slow its rate of descent to 60 feet per round, landing on its feet and taking no falling damage. It can move up to 5 feet horizontally for every 1 foot it falls. The lemurfolk can't gain height with its gliding membranes alone. If subjected to a strong wind or lift of any kind, it can use the updraft to glide farther.
